The FHIRStation doesn't seem to have any for Cady? https://fire-pit.mihin.org/fhirstation/Immunization/Patient-1126 Are we using the wrong source?

The FHIRStation doesn't seem to have any for Cady? https://fire-pit.mihin.org/fhirstation/Immunization/Patient-1126 Are we using the wrong source?

Hi Avery, we were having some trouble earlier getting Cady's immunizations with the FHIR Station. You may have to use the EHR FHIR pits while we work on getting the updated url that will allow you to find all her immunizations while you wait. I think @Mike and @Peter Murphy were working with Linda while waiting for the updated URL
Hm, none of the FHIR pits seem to have data for Cady either. We'll just have to wait for the FHIR station looks like

Hm, none of the FHIR pits seem to have data for Cady either. We'll just have to wait for the FHIR station looks like

Have you tried Linda (Patient-1155)? We also have Billy (Patient-1124).

I'll check in with our Developers to see how close we are to the new url.
